name: TalentPack
overview:
TalentPack is a web-based applicant tracking and recruiting system which is used by small to medium size companies to streamline the hiring process. Our online recruitment software is fit for recruiting departments or small business seeking a cloud based solution with nothing to install.

Social recruitment is one of the main benefits that our system offers through job broadcasting your positions, this way the right Talent see your job advertisements plus you can track and view your applicants all the way through the recruitment life cycle with the touch of a button.

TalentPack works as recruitment database management tool and back office for online recruitment. Posting your job to multiple job-boards is simple, our system in integrated with logic melon and social media so when you want to post a job all you have to do is select the medium and your job is live. Also you can see from our reporting area, where each applicant came from and which job boards and social media are performing for you.

Through TalentPack you can coordinate candidate sourcing by utilising all available recruiting tools including: social media, job boards, employee referrals and other recruiting tools: LinkedIn, Facebook, Google, Twitter and other forms of Social Media.

relationships.title: UK Business Development and Sales Team Leader
